instruction: Outline an argumentative essay on the topic of animal testing.
output:
Outline of Argumentative Essay on Animal Testing:

I. Introduction 
A. Definition of animal testing 
B. Overview of the pros and cons of animal testing 

II. Body 
A. The history of animal testing 
B. The pros of animal testing 
1. It can lead to medical breakthroughs 
2. It can have benefits for the animals and the research scientists 
C. The cons of animal testing 
1. It can cause animals to suffer 
2. It can be seen as unethical and cruel 

III. Conclusion 
A. Summary of the pros and cons of animal testing 
B. Argument advocating for the abolishment of animal testing 
C. Call for a more ethical method of research
